title: Car Loans in Canada
description: The difference between dealer financing and bank loans.

content.title: Dealer Promos
content.text: Dealers may offer 0% or low interest on new cars to attract buyers. However, if you have no credit history, they may charge you very high interest (10%+) or require a large down payment.

quiz.question: What is an 'Instalment Sale Contract' at a dealership?
options: The lender owns the car until it is paid in full
It is a type of rental
quiz.explanation: In most dealer financing, the lender technically owns the vehicle until the final payment is made.
